projectDescription: Clonning facebook using Angular for frontend and Nest.js for backend. In dev.
an eCommerce progressive web app built using these awesome technologies (Angular, Express.js, Sequelize.js, and Stripe for payment gateway).
Facebook clone with basic features, built using PHP framework (Codeigniter3). - still in development. Not yet responsive for desktop.
an eCommerce website with basic features built using MERN (MySQL) stack.
Like a Social media web app built using Vue and Firebase. Not yet desktop responsive.
a real-time web-based chat application built using Nextjs and Firebase.
EVSU Student Portal clone, got the data by scraping the content of the current system user. Built using nextjs for frontend and nodejs (express, request, cheerio) for backend.
an IMDB clone which is a progressive web application (PWA), got the data from TMDB API with the help of vue framework (nuxtjs).
a desktop application that will help you to segregate your scattered files in just one click, built with electronjs.
